content:
{
    "source_filename": "AudioFilterType.yaml",
    "metadata": {},
    "content": "# This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
# To submit a bug report on the content, see
# https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: AudioFilterType
type: enum
summary: |
  Filter types used for `Class.AudioFilter` instances.
description: |
  Families of curves that `Class.AudioFilter` can use to process incoming audio.
  Each filter type is applied at a specified
  `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency` and may be shaped by additional
  `Class.AudioFilter.Gain|Gain` or `Class.AudioFilter.Q|Q` parameters.
code_samples: []
tags: []
deprecation_message: ''
items:
  - name: Peak
    summary: |
      Filter that boosts or reduces sound near a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: LowShelf
    summary: |
      Filter that boosts or reduces sound below a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: HighShelf
    summary: |
      Filter that boosts or reduces sound above a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Lowpass12dB
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound above a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`, at a slope of -12dB/octave.
    value: 3
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Lowpass24dB
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound above a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`, at a slope of -24dB/octave.
    value: 4
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Lowpass48dB
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound above a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`, at a slope of -48dB/octave.
    value: 5
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Highpass12dB
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound below a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`, at a slope of -12dB/octave.
    value: 6
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Highpass24dB
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound below a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`, at a slope of -24dB/octave.
    value: 7
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Highpass48dB
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound below a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`, at a slope of -48dB/octave.
    value: 8
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Bandpass
    summary: |
      Filter that only allows sound near a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency` to be heard.
    value: 9
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Notch
    summary: |
      Filter that cuts sound near a specified
      `Class.AudioFilter.Frequency|Frequency`.
    value: 10
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
  - name: Lowpass6dB
    summary: ''
    value: 11
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''"
}
